fields.name: Title
fields.description: Primary title of the resource, often taken from metadata or scanned map.

fields.name: Alternative Title
fields.description: Secondary titles, often in a different language or format.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A human-readable summary or abstract of the resource.
example: This polygon shapefile represents the public schools in Boston.

fields.name: Language
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 639-2 language code of the resource's content.

fields.name: Display Note
fields.description: Free-text note to display in item details.

fields.name: Creator
fields.description: Primary entity or individual responsible for creating the resource.

fields.name: Publisher
fields.description: Entity that published or distributed the resource.

fields.name: Provider
fields.description: Institution that provides the metadata and access to the resource.

fields.name: Resource Class
fields.description: Broad classification of the resource (e.g., Datasets, Maps).

fields.name: Resource Type
fields.description: More specific type of resource (e.g., Polygon data, Index maps).

fields.name: Subject
fields.description: Topics or subjects describing the resource.

fields.name: Theme
fields.description: High-level thematic categories, often from a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: Keyword
fields.description: Free-text keywords or phrases related to the resource.

fields.name: Temporal Coverage
fields.description: Time period covered by the resource.

fields.name: Date Issued
fields.description: Date of publication or release in ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: Index Year
fields.description: Single year for search facets and sorting.

fields.name: Date Range
fields.description: Time span for the data in Solr range format.

fields.name: Spatial Coverage
fields.description: Place names, region, or bounding description.

fields.name: Geometry
fields.description: WKT or ENVELOPE string of the resource geometry.

fields.name: Bounding Box
fields.description: Bounding box of the resource in ENVELOPE(W,E,N,S) format.

fields.name: Centroid
fields.description: Center point of the resource in 'lat,long' format.

fields.name: Georeferenced
fields.description: Whether the resource is georeferenced.

fields.name: Relation
fields.description: General related resources or identifiers.

fields.name: Member Of
fields.description: Collections or sets the resource belongs to.

fields.name: Is Part Of
fields.description: Parent resource or collection identifier.

fields.name: Source
fields.description: Originating metadata system or source collection.

fields.name: Is Version Of
fields.description: Previous versions of the resource.

fields.name: Replaces
fields.description: Older resources that this replaces.

fields.name: Is Replaced By
fields.description: Newer versions replacing this one.

fields.name: Rights
fields.description: Statement about rights held on the resource.

fields.name: Rights Holder
fields.description: Entity holding the rights for the resource.

fields.name: License
fields.description: License URI or text indicating permissions for use.

fields.name: Access Rights
fields.description: Access classification such as 'Public' or 'Restricted'.

fields.name: Format
fields.description: Format of the downloadable file or map service.

fields.name: File Size
fields.description: Size of the downloadable resource.

fields.name: WxS Identifier
fields.description: Internal identifier used in web services.

fields.name: ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the record.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Other identifiers such as DOIs, ARKs, UUIDs.

fields.name: Suppressed
fields.description: Whether the record should be excluded from public display.
